alert.note: Alert for Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:40PM EST until January 16 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...A period of freezing rain is possible early Sun morning with mainly a trace of ice occurring prior to precipitation becoming plain rain later Sun morning. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Northern Horry and Williamsburg Counties. In North Carolina, Inland Pender and Columbus Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 11 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...A trace of ice may occur across elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses and trees.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
